     Oct 26, 2020 
 
     KARNALYTE RESOURCES INC. ANNOUNCES RESULTS OF INVESTIGATION 
 
     • NO BREACHES FOUND IN THOROUGH INVESTIGATION LED BY LEADING LAW FIRM Not for distribution to U.S. news wire services or dissemination in the United States. SASKATOON, SK (CNW- OCT 26, 2020) – Karnalyte Resources Inc. (“Karnalyte” or the “Company”) (TSX: KRN) announces the completion of an investigation of allegations made by a small group of dissident shareholders (the “Dissidents”). ...      KARNALYTE RESOURCES INC. ANNOUNCES 2020 SECOND QUARTER RESULTS 
 
     KARNALYTE RESOURCES INC. ANNOUNCES 2020 SECOND QUARTER RESULTS Not for distribution to U.S. news wire services or dissemination in the United States.
